  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x82
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x82
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x58
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18

          text run at (0,0) width 555: "Test passes if there is no white space between the blue box below and the orange lines."
